title: Profiles In Soil Health: "Improving Soil Health & Overcoming Challenges" With Don & Trista Nickelson

tasks.task: Operating a farm and ranch in Frederick, South Dakota, involving crop and livestock management.
subtasks: Farming various crops such as corn, soybeans, oats, triticale, and alfalfa.
Ranching cattle and utilizing them for crop ground management.
Using precision agriculture tools for soil analysis and site-specific management.
Identifying and addressing poor-producing areas in crops.
Implementing bale grazing and rotational grazing for pasture management.
Managing potholes and saline areas affected by excessive water ponding.
Observing and adjusting management practices based on seasonal changes and soil health.
Passing on farming knowledge and decision-making autonomy to the next generation.
